stories.text: I need help. I’ve been hacked, stalked, bullied. Idk what these people want but it has just about taken everything in my life and the stress and harassment has just about ended my beautiful marriage! I’m tired. I want to hurt someone but I realize that wouldn’t fix the problem because another one of these loser hackers will just crawl out of their moms basement and take the dead ones place
stories.title: Exhausted

Simple software things that are actually very complicated

stories.text:
I don't know if you have noticed that if you copy+paste into email pages/apps like outlook and gmail they bring over all the formatting and styling of the source. That is, it pastes the text in with things like the font color and background color, and the font type itself, which then become the styling for the rest of the email if you keep typing as well.

Who came up with this? It makes absolutely no sense that anyone would want to transplant styling/formatting into an email, where there is no guarantee (indeed, little chance) that it will mesh well. It's just baffling.
stories.title: Ask HN: Who decided copy+paste should copy styling/formatting?
